source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_00<tab>Biggs seems eager to forge further into the machine.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_00<tab>ショートストップ野営地のビッグスは、新たな使命を伝えたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_01On speaking with Biggs and Wedge, you learn that the Illuminati have taken exception to your previous incursion into their territory, going so far as to call for your death. Unfortunately, you have no choice but to invade their fortress again for the good of the realm. Steel yourself to enter the colossus.

※The Cuff of the Father can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
ゴブリン族の科学者集団「青の手」が、機械の蛮神を召喚した。ヤ・シュトラは二正面作戦を敢行し、一翼はヤ・シュトラに、一翼は冒険者とシドに託される。胎動する蛮神の内部で冒険者らは、「青の手」を率いる万能のクイックシンクスと遭遇。そこで、「アレキサンダー計劃」なる謎めいた構想がほのめかされた……。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編2」に入れるようになった。「青の手」は暗号通信を通じて、宣戦を布告している。蛮神アレキサンダーの動力源を突き止めるため、しっかりと準備を整えて、仲間とともに迷宮に挑もう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。また、シャーレアン工匠街にある「」からも挑戦できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_02<tab>You have felled the Illuminati forces that sought to block your path. Leave them and the area behind you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_02<tab>「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編2」を攻略した。この区画から脱出しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_03<tab>On your way out of the colossus, you encounter Cid, Mide, and Roundrox, who have taken the opportunity to survey the interior. As you look on, the treasure hunter searches through the belongings of a fallen goblin, seemingly in vain. When Cid subsequently asks what she is looking for, she tells him that her prize is the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>...just as the goblin machinist suggested during your encounter with Quickthinx Allthoughts. The tome, written some hundred years past, apparently holds the plans for a variety of technological wonders. Chief among them is the invention known as “Alexander”─a walking citadel designed to serve as a bastion of reason and logic. Plainly, it is this ideal that gave form to the Illuminati's primal. Return to Biggs, and relate all that you have learned.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_03<tab>ミーデが行方を追う「エニグマ・コーデックス」には、科学者の理想郷たる「移動都市」の構想が記されているらしい。「青の手」が蛮神アレキサンダーを召喚したのは、その実現のためだった。だが、「青の手」に蛮神の力をあたえることは、きわめて危険だとシドは直観する……。今回の突入の成果を、ショートストップ野営地の「ビッグス」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_04<tab>Biggs listens intently as you recount your tale. Though plainly impressed by the idea of a walking fortress, he bemoans the Illuminati's reckless approach to realizing the design. Bastion of reason and logic or not, it is a primal, and must be destroyed.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_04<tab>ビッグスに報告した。引き続きシドたちと「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編」の攻略を進めていこう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SEQ_05<tab>

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_00<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter the Cuff of the Father.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_00<tab>「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編2」を攻略

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_01<tab>Use the Duty Finder to enter the Cuff of the Father.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_01<tab>「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編2」を攻略

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_02<tab>Report to Biggs.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_TODO_02<tab>ビッグスに報告

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ready to have another go at finding the giant's core?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_000よし、)) (( )) 03 /var>。
引き続き、「巨人」の内部構造の調査と、
動力源の捜索にあたってもらえるか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_001<tab>Wedge, could you─ Oi, Wedge! Stop listening to that bloody linkpearl! We barged through the Illuminati's front door─they know we've broken their code.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_001……おいウェッジ、これ以上は、傍受しても無意味だ。
先の進入で、「青の手」も暗号が破られたと知ってるんだからな。
解読された暗号通信なんて、宣戦布告ぐらいにしか使えないぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_002<tab>But I've just this moment intercepted a new communication! If you'll give me a moment to... There! It says... Oh. “Death to uplanders... Death to uplanders...” Ahem. I-I think we may have started a war...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_002だけど今、新しい通信が流れてきたとこッス……解読結果は……
うわっと……「死死死死死死死死死死死死死死死死」……！？
「青の手」め、完全に挑発してきてるッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You now have access to the Cuff of the Father. Gordias can be accessed via the entrance in the Makers' Quarter.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_SYSTEM_000_010「機工城アレキサンダー：起動編2」に挑戦可能になりました。
コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
また、シャーレアン工匠街にあるからも挑戦できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_020<tab>My, but Roundrox has a lot of treasures! Not many are of much use, but they're all lovely in their own right.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_020この娘のとっておきのがらくたを、見せてもらっているの。
廃棄部品はね、何かの役に立つかどうかじゃなくて、
「かわいい」かどうかが重要なの！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_021<tab>She has a fine eye... Speaking of which, do you recall me mentioning that she had described Quickthinx's face, and how I assumed she must mean his mask? Well, the more I think about what she said, the more I think she really <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> mean his face. But how could she possibly tell?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_021……ところで、この娘によると、万能のクイックシンクスは、
機械っぽくて精悍な顔立ちだったらしいけど……。
ゴブリン族って、マスク越しでも顔がわかるのかな……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_030<tab>Pshkohhh... Roundrox likes Mide. Trading tongueflaps is much fun!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_030チュコォ……チュコォ……
ミーデって　すごいゴブ！
かわいいがらくたと　かわいくないの　ちゃんとわかるゴブ♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_031<tab>Look, look─this whirlycog Roundrox finds sixty-three yalms north and west! And that one was only ten yalms from Arkhitekton!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_031その歯車は　ここから北北西72ヤルムの場所に落ちてたゴブ♪
こっちのポンコツキカイは　大工房アーキテクトンの入口から、
南東24ヤルムの場所でひろったゴブ♪

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_032Pshkohhh... Shiny junk and sparkly rocks,♪
Bittybobs and whirlycogs.♪
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_032チュコォ……チュコォ……
が～らがらがら　くったくた～♪
く～たくたくた　がっらがら～♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_040<tab>Backrix is still helping me to intercept Illuminati communications.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_040そこのバックリクスっていうゴブリン族に協力してもらって、
怪しい信号が流れてないか、引き続き傍受してるッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_041<tab>He really is a natural when it comes to codes! Truly, these goblins never cease to amaze me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_041「記録屋」というだけあって、暗号や通信にも強いッス！
ゴブリン族の知識や技術力も、なかなかのもんッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_050<tab>If the Illuminati want a war, it seems only fair that we bring their base to its knees. We need to find the giant's core and quick!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_050「青の手」のやつら、完全に挑発してやがるな……！
「巨人」の内部構造の調査と、動力源の捜索を続けてくれるか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_500<tab>Pshkohhh... Uplander is amazing! Uplander is stronger than...than ten gobbies!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_500チュコォ……チュコォ……
　とてとて　つよつよゴブ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_501<tab>Ah! There you are, old friend. I was beginning to wonder if I'd ever find you. Biggs's account left something to be desired, so I thought it best to see the interior with my own eyes.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_501ふぅ、ようやく追いついたぜ……。
ビッグスからの話だけじゃ、わからんことだらけでな。
俺自身の目で、内部を確かめにきちまったよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_503<tab>Hm! A treasure hunter, through and through. Tell me, what exactly do you hope to find here?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_503トレジャーハンターだったな。
……いったい、何を探してるんだ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_504<tab>Ever heard of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>? It's a book of ideas written some hundred years past─the life's work of one of the greatest technologists ever to draw breath.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_504「エニグマ・コーデックス」……。
100年ほど前、とある天才技師が記した、科学思想の書よ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_505<tab>Within its pages are found myriad wonders─from designs for machina that could operate ceaselessly for centuries to novel ways of culturing cheese. Even a fragment of the book could bring a king's ransom.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_505そこには、あらゆる技術的アイディアが記されてる。
何百年も動く無限機構から、おいしいチーズの作り方までね。
その「断章」には、高い賞金が懸けられているの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_506<tab>But most remarkable of all are the plans for a walking citadel. It was to be a beacon of logic and reason for all the world.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_506移動式の城塞を構築し、科学による理想世界を実現する構想……
「アレキサンダー計劃」も、その書に記されているわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_507<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>walking<var 1A 01 /var> citadel? ...Seven hells! We're standing in it, aren't we!? The Illuminati's primal took its form from that idea! ...But I sense that none of this is news to you. You've read it, then, this <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_507……となると、「青の手」はその構想に基づいて、
蛮神を召喚したのか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_508<tab>The design catered for every needful thing, from warm beds to crops of grain. Its occupants would never have to leave. And all in a fortress on feet, impenetrable and ready to move at a moment's notice.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_508住環境から、食料生産施設まで、
すべてを備えた閉鎖環境を作り上げ、これを移動可能にする。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_509<tab>The citadel was meant to bear the most brilliant scholars and artificers of the age to all four corners of the world, that they might set about unraveling the mysteries of creation. And this utopia...this shining seat of erudition, was to be called Alexander.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_509その移動都市には、高い知性を持つ科学者だけが居住し、
各地を巡って世界の神秘を探る。
……それが「アレキサンダー計劃」の描く、理想郷の姿。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_510<tab>Pshkohhh... If Roundrox lived in walking castle, Roundrox could collect treasure from everywhere!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_510チュコォ……チュコォ……
すごすごゴブ～！　あるくお城で　セカイじゅうのがらくた
あつめホーダイ　ゴブ～♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_511<tab>Indeed you could, little one. And anything you found─be it junk, forgotten teachings, or lost secrets─would be yours for the taking.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_511そうね……。
ステキながらくたも、失われた科学技術もね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_512<tab>...And what exactly would the Illuminati do with all of this knowledge?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_512<tab>そうやって集積した技術を、連中は何に使うつもりなんだ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_513<tab>They would use it to take control, most likely. Create a world ruled by a few chosen scholars. Unless I'm mistaken, that's why the Illuminati exist.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_513優れた科学者集団のみで寡占し、世界を「管理」する。
……連中は、そう称しているみたい。
「青の手」はもともと、その理念を実現するために結成されたのよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_514<tab>Bloody fanatics. Take a perfectly good idea and make it into an object of faith. What could possibly go wrong...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_514「エニグマ・コーデックス」は、
科学の狂信者を生んだ聖典、というわけか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_515<tab>I can well imagine how a people who have spent decades carrying their homes on their backs might crave a home that could carry them─how such a place could seem like a utopia.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_515お前さんたちゴブリン族は、長らく放浪の民として暮らしてきた。
その書が描く理想郷は、とても魅力的に映るかもしれん。
……だが、蛮神の力を「青の手」に託すのは危険すぎるぜ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_516But we're not talking about a machine here─we're talking about a primal. And primals will be the death of us all.
I trust you'll be ready when things come to a head, )) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_CID_000_516ヤツらとの対決は、避けられんだろうな。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうか力を貸してくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_517<tab>Pshkohhh... Utopia is happyplace? Hmmm... Where there is junk aplenty, Roundrox is happy. Where is very happyplace of Mide?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_517チュコォ……チュコォ……
ラウンドロクス　がらくたあれば　しあわせゴブ♪
ミーデの理想　どんなトコ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_518<tab>...Wherever he is.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_518私の理想郷は……
好きな人がいるところ、かな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_600<tab>I think Roundrox's pile of treasures may have grown a touch. Not that that's any surprise─she goes hunting whenever she has a spare moment. Heh. A girl after my own heart.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_MIDE_000_600この娘の宝物、少し増えたわ。
ヒマさえあれば、あちこちに廃品集めにいってるみたい。
……がらくたや機械が、本当に大好きなのね。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_610Pssshkoh... Shiny junk and sparkly rocks,♪
Bittybobs and whirlycogs.♪
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_610チュコォ……チュコォ……
が～らがらがら　ゴッブゴ～ブ♪
が～ら　くったく～た　増えたゴブ～♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_611<tab>Sometimes Backrix is coming with Roundrox for junk hunting.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_611がらくたあつめ　記録屋のバックリクスにも
ときどき　手伝ってもらってるゴブ♪
バックリクス　ラウンドロクスより　少しお兄ちゃんゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_612<tab>Uplander will come next time, too?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_ROUNDROX_000_612チュコォ……チュコォ……
今度、にも　がらくたひろい
つきあってほしいゴブ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_620If my ears seem red, it's because Y'shtola just called. Dear me...I didn't think she knew such language! I gather Matoya may not be the easiest of taskmasters.

...Not that I don't sympathize, of course. I wonder what she'd say if she had to work under the chief...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_WEDGE_000_620)) (( )) 03 /var>、おかえりッス！
さっきまで、ヤ・シュトラさんと連絡取ってたところッス！
マトーヤさんの人使いが荒いって、珍しくぼやいてたッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_650<tab>This <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> sounds amazing. A walking citadel's one thing, but a <var 1A 02 /var>self-sustaining<var 1A 01 /var>, walking citadel...? Genius! It's just a pity the Illuminati had to go and make a bleedin' primal out of it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_650「エニグマ・コーデックス」に記された、移動都市構想。
興味深い計画だが……問題は、あれが蛮神ってことだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_651<tab>From what I understand, this “Alexander” was active for no more than a few seconds─that's <var 1A 02 /var>seconds<var 1A 01 /var>─and it nigh drained the hinterlands of aether. Imagine what it'd do if it wandered the whole bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>world<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_651あの「アレキサンダー」とかいうデカブツが一瞬起動しただけで、
周辺のエーテルを喰らいつくす勢いだってのに、
まして、動きまわりでもしたら……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_652<tab>I don't think Roundrox realizes how much danger we're in here. Too busy hunting for new treasures. Probably for the best, though, eh?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR102_02091_BIGGS_000_652それにしても、そこのゴブリン族の娘は、
がらくたの山が増えたとか何とか……
……やれやれ、危機感を持ってほしいぜ。
